member.name: T:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Connect.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnConnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being loaded.
member.param: Root object of the host application.
Describes how the Add-in is being loaded.
Object representing this Add-in.

member.name: M:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.
member.param: Describes how the Add-in is being unloaded.
Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Connect.QueryStatus(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatusTextWanted,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatus@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Implements the QueryStatus method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command's availability is updated
member.param: The name of the command to determine state for.
Text that is needed for the command.
The state of the command in the user interface.
Text requested by the neededText parameter.

member.name: M:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Connect.Exec(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandExecOption,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Implements the Exec method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command is invoked.
member.param: The name of the command to execute.
Describes how the command should be run.
Parameters passed from the caller to the command handler.
Parameters passed from the command handler to the caller.
Informs the caller if the command was handled or not.

member.name: P:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Services.Resources.DefaultTodoPatterns
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ArrayOfTodoPattern> <TodoPattern default="true"> <Title>Todo</Title> <SearchPattern><![CDATA[(?<=\W|^)(?<TAG>TODO)(.*)]]></SearchPattern> </TodoPattern> <TodoPattern> <Title>Hack</Title> <SearchPattern><![CDATA[(?<=\W|^)(?<TAG>HACK)(.*)]]></SearchPattern> </TodoPattern> <TodoPattern> <Title>Ask</Title> <SearchPattern><![CDATA[(?<=\W|^)(?<TAG>ASK)(.*)]]></SearchPattern> </TodoPattern> [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Services.Resources.ScriptAsAlter_ReplaceRegex
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ^\s*CREATE(?=\s*(?:PROCEDURE|PROC|FUNCTION|FUNC)).

member.name: P:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Services.Resources.SQL_Routine
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to USE [{0}] -- Database name SELECT ROUTINE_OBJECTID = SC.id , SR.ROUTINE_SCHEMA , SR.ROUTINE_NAME , ROUTINE_FULLNAME = SR.ROUTINE_SCHEMA + '.' + SR.ROUTINE_NAME , SR.ROUTINE_TYPE , SC.colid , ROUTINE_DEFINITION = SC.[text] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES SR JOIN sys.syscomments SC ON SC.id = OBJECT_ID(ROUTINE_SCHEMA + '.' + ROUTINE_NAME) WHERE SC.id = {1} -- OBJECT_ID ORDER BY ROUTINE_OBJECTID, colid.

member.name: P:DamnTools.SqlTodoExplorer.Services.Resources.SQL_Routines
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to USE [{0}] -- Database name SELECT ROUTINE_OBJECTID = SC.id , SR.ROUTINE_SCHEMA , SR.ROUTINE_NAME , ROUTINE_FULLNAME = SR.ROUTINE_SCHEMA + '.' + SR.ROUTINE_NAME , SR.ROUTINE_TYPE , SC.colid , ROUTINE_DEFINITION = SC.[text] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES SR JOIN sys.syscomments SC ON SC.id = OBJECT_ID(ROUTINE_SCHEMA + '.' + ROUTINE_NAME) ORDER BY ROUTINE_OBJECTID, colid.
